Name: Apple Brandy Sour
Ingredients: 45 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist (discarded) and garnish with a skewered lemon slice wheel and Luxardo Maraschino Cherry sail.
Review: Sour by name - balanced sweet and sour apple by nature.
Nutrition: One serving of Apple Brandy Sour contains 170 calories
